articles.title: CES Gadget Show: Say 'no' to junk food with DNA wristband
articles.description: LAS VEGAS (AP) — A wristband that will help you say “no" to junk food. A machine that will mix drinks for you.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS (AP) A wristband that will help you say no" to junk food. A machine that will mix drinks for you.

articles.title: French midfielders Pogba, Sissoko have operations
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — French midfielders Paul Pogba and Moussa Sissoko have had operations to deal with injuries.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) French midfielders Paul Pogba and Moussa Sissoko have had operations to deal with injuries.
Pogba, who has managed only eight appearances for Manchester United this season, posted a video after his ankle surgery saying everything went well."
